based on.from sentence: These ablation results are shown in and 4 , all based on the Multi - NLI development sets .

each added layer model.from sentence: As shown , each added layer model improves the accuracy and we achieve a substantial improvement in accuracy ( around 2 % ) on both matched and mismatched settings , compared to the single - layer biLSTM in .

last ablation.from sentence: The last ablation in shows that a classifier with two layers of relu is preferable than other options .

shortcut connections.from sentence: Next , in , we show that the shortcut connections among the biLSTM layers is also an important contributor to accuracy improvement ( around 1.5 % on top of the full 3 - layered stacked - RNN model ) .

results.for both: in - domain task and cross - domain tasks

fine - tuning.from sentence: Next , in , we show that fine - tuning the word embeddings also improves results , again for both the in - domain task and cross - domain tasks ( the ablation results are based on a smaller model with a 128 +256 2 - layer biLSTM ) .
